remarks: Define the class of all subspaces of complex normed vector spaces. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-ssp $p |- SubSp = ( u e. NrmCVec |-> { w e. NrmCVec | ( ( +v ` w ) C_ ( +v ` u ) /\ ( .sOLD ` w ) C_ ( .sOLD ` u ) /\ ( normCV ` w ) C_ ( normCV ` u ) ) } ) $.
$d u w $.
